name: Wagyan Land 2
overview: Wagan Land 2 is the sequel to Wagan Land. In this game, the player controls Wagan II, son of Wagan. While gameplay is mostly similar, a few new features have been added. The action scenes now have power-ups and there are now special stages. New minigames, such as number search, noise breakdown, and a panel-based rock-paper-scissors.
